goal: Two-Weapon Fighting: Use actual ability modifier instead of hardcoded +3

sessions.task: Implement actual ability modifier for Two-Weapon Fighting (#424)
sessions.notes: Replaced hardcoded abilityModifier := 3 with registry.GetCharacterAbilityScores().DexterityMod(). Added table-driven tests for DEX 16/14/10/8. Updated existing TWF tests to register ability scores.
